sn48.125-136:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ganga nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn48.125-136:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancindriyani bhavento pancindriyani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn48.125-136:1.3: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancindriyani bhavento pancindriyani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo?
sn48.125-136:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhindriyam bhaveti ragavinayapariyosanam dosavinayapariyosanam mohavinayapariyosanam …pe… pannindriyam bhaveti ragavinayapariyosanam dosavinayapariyosanam mohavinayapariyosanam.
sn48.125-136:1.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancindriyani bhavento pancindriyani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
